tickets.subject: RE: Company Newsletter - Volume 77
tickets.description:
Hello folks,

 

That Presidents Roundtable sure looked like fun!  What are the production/dollar requirements for being invited?

 

Sincerely,

 

Benedict Pedro

CPRES Certified Probate Real Estate Specialist

Real Estate Collaborative Specialist - Divorce (RCS-D)

Alain Pinel Realtors Presidents Club Member

408.242.4823 mobile

408.754.1501 fax

benedict@apr.com

www.siliconvalleyhomes.org

California BRE License #01334076

5353 Almaden Expressway Suite A150

San Jose, CA 95118

 

I have not verified any of the information contained in those documents that were prepared by other people.

 

From: APR Marketing [mailto:marketing@apr.com]
Sent: Friday, June 1, 2018 4:46 PM
To: Benedict Pedro <benedict@apr.com>
Subject: Company Newsletter - Volume 77

 

View this email in your browser (http://o1.apr.com/wf/click?upn=CuH1u-2BFJ7uPVuwNoyCtsSv5JwtuThKcL8FRZMHpqp-2F70Pkit6ofqeGtPkStVmGvHYGxDLYV7iqEZGDK8sX52e8443htnE2Dd6Tg6wgzAEiECMMixnQWp9dmNhFpNT3F7_HcmTR6jcYpC88W5oqhq2V-2BAMMsb3FgDrZK-2FWrVbQy-2FF-2FB2yZzBnlLOfva5OGS29YqK25C0vEUl7krBYMmjqh74tgu9Ol9I1sTPIEwWRAgCDeacHSvdHnO0INJTTyZIVWmdqX2DUXYRdQYgXq5X9nkYVQR5oZFjZtIDt0sR-2BtjADADDFHlN09IKMAgx5Icu7hrDf3vDSKcAvC00mMPFAl-2FkfbUZwRzx37aGKlN-2FWgbeSsB8nm-2BPptqtq7r5TRgFoaDfsehMmv64CRC3dqznipjCwrKT0F90xQ1krs2RZ-2BkHJuD1uBWzgAnu-2F3uC0-2B-2BEKTdX1EoDIv1GaoJWQbsvUlejz7Hx-2FUI1oBt2hRapvqhf1K4dCeZev4YIXCB6V8G-2FAjDMGPvnU-2BQfbOCW-2BF-2B8frs00pPZQm4lDhwi6pmvUwTls967yr9sjPe5hQ0CzPt6PcaxXuTY1xJ0UvM-2F7TDOdbls71uelT-2Be2JtCvOAVBzcJhRD-2BzCd6RmiXf8l3J2JNsETxBjYeQB9r0IBxvwFqnY1KHksXbFHjEp66b8UaRgpJkCZoTJNNTCvwNEEuejHlWArUzBiuZZjV4JGP3HwA8ybjFCkigP0U7jCYF1oKQXVNvzRtbaPsjp8pizXv4QQf9gCUc-2BYGe-2F56El7G3BtaIdNYQ1S5NHAbxAFr3rKc7I95DkK5gB1-2F3BIuQLOGWIYw6FH-2Bk1JadfA98u34i43CO-2BxzupBGH-2Fpen4ByCzIvpQcUbpXS76y-2BiV9MpgyGuhD5HZM71gwYq26YifWK2WGI51jA-3D-3D)

 

 

 

 

 

Alain Pinel Realtors®

 

 

June 2018 | Volume 77

 

APR OPENS IN LIVERMORE

 

APR is proud to announce its expansion in the East Bay with a new office in Livermore! Managed by Don Faught, Manager of the Pleasanton Office, this new space is a renovated home that provides a working hub for mobile APR agents. The office officially opened on May 31, 2018 with a grand opening party for the real estate community featuring live music and local food and beverages.

 

We're Local

 

 

 

ROSS FIRST FRIDAY EVENT

 

Alain Pinel’s Ross Office was part of the local First Friday event, serving ice cream to nearly 200 happy visitors. This was the first First Friday event held in Ross and was a huge success! Organized by the newly formed Ross Merchants Association, this event will now continue on the first Friday of each month. Thanks to the Ross team that made this fun community event happen!

EARTHQUAKES RAFFLE WINNERS

Thanks to all who helped get the word out about Alain Pinel’s Kick Homelessness Challenge! If you shared our video (http://o1.apr.com/wf/click?upn=cBqXFUYfxgXEjKNrUffxDHxPOjVquHJr5dr26YK1Nth0CBOTiQofr06a2Q87U-2F6opoI6Eqgl-2B6Ge0xSyjxtN5Q-3D-3D_HcmTR6jcYpC88W5oqhq2V-2BAMMsb3FgDrZK-2FWrVbQy-2FF-2FB2yZzBnlLOfva5OGS29YqK25C0vEUl7krBYMmjqh74tgu9Ol9I1sTPIEwWRAgCDeacHSvdHnO0INJTTyZIVWmdqX2DUXYRdQYgXq5X9nkYVQR5oZFjZtIDt0sR-2BtjADADDFHlN09IKMAgx5Icu7hrDf3vDSKcAvC00mMPFAl-2FkfbUZwRzx37aGKlN-2FWgbeSsB8nm-2BPptqtq7r5TRgFoaDfsehMmv64CRC3dqznipjCwrKT0F90xQ1krs2RZ-2BkHJuD1uBWzgAnu-2F3uC0-2B-2BEKTdX1EoDIv1GaoJWQbsvUlejz7Hx-2FUI1oBt2hRapvqhf1K4dCeZev4YIXCB6V8G-2FAjDMGPvnU-2BQfbOCW-2BF-2B8frs00pPZQm4lDhwi6pmvUwTls967yr9sjPe5hQ0CzPt6PcaxXuTY1xJ0UvM-2F7TDOdbls71uelT-2Be2JtCvOAVBzcJhRD-2BzCd6RmiXf8l3J2JNsETxBjYeQB9r0IBxvwFqnY1KHksXbFHjEp66b8UaRgpJkCZoTJNNTCvwNEEuejHlWAWji4ho5dEfWi5u8yuuj3P-2FKGTmLjoJYb61ceoxmWVGMtX8FnyamM3Qpaw-2FyE4ZEFseoJglB5XRaRyJFsDoInmeGkzxhDAmvqlSZy4-2BgczbxJweK-2BFUs75M-2FOQ6d7nhe45mliEQEBSFqNx7FBppgUAJFfdu8Ql9ogLYgXF3mkEsZU7HSH85e1wADqpYY-2FGWnoF4kzTY3WsjUSb5adt4ZgIQ-3D-3D) , your name was entered into a raffle to win a soccer ball signed by Earthquakes star Chris Wondolowski. Our lucky winners were Rhonda Hansen, Nancee Pham, Margaret Garber-Teeter, Heena Joshi, the Harber Group, Barbara Warren, and Dennis Naranche. Congratulations!

Don’t forget to tune in to CBS on Sundays at 11:40 p.m. to see APR on TV! APR will be donating $1000 for every goal scored by Chris to help end homelessness.

 

We're Global

 

 

 

APR IN CHINA – LPS BEIJING

 

Once again, APR will be sending a group of 12 agents to China to attend LPS Beijing 2018 (http://o1.apr.com/wf/click?upn=TJDHa7bd4J0rHhOeuksVlTlOLDiyR1O9TeEeCYKXSSqYgoJzF-2Fk9S4n-2BOhAIcBIl_HcmTR6jcYpC88W5oqhq2V-2BAMMsb3FgDrZK-2FWrVbQy-2FF-2FB2yZzBnlLOfva5OGS29YqK25C0vEUl7krBYMmjqh74tgu9Ol9I1sTPIEwWRAgCDeacHSvdHnO0INJTTyZIVWmdqX2DUXYRdQYgXq5X9nkYVQR5oZFjZtIDt0sR-2BtjADADDFHlN09IKMAgx5Icu7hrDf3vDSKcAvC00mMPFAl-2FkfbUZwRzx37aGKlN-2FWgbeSsB8nm-2BPptqtq7r5TRgFoaDfsehMmv64CRC3dqznipjCwrKT0F90xQ1krs2RZ-2BkHJuD1uBWzgAnu-2F3uC0-2B-2BEKTdX1EoDIv1GaoJWQbsvUlejz7Hx-2FUI1oBt2hRapvqhf1K4dCeZev4YIXCB6V8G-2FAjDMGPvnU-2BQfbOCW-2BF-2B8frs00pPZQm4lDhwi6pmvUwTls967yr9sjPe5hQ0CzPt6PcaxXuTY1xJ0UvM-2F7TDOdbls71uelT-2Be2JtCvOAVBzcJhRD-2BzCd6RmiXf8l3J2JNsETxBjYeQB9r0IBxvwFqnY1KHksXbFHjEp66b8UaRgpJkCZoTJNNTCvwNEEuejHlWARx6vpHa-2BOgD71luJf-2BUk9R6KQrTFe2fTeYY16mNUR2JP1bBZDFX-2FBKpZzTUI52I-2Bf3ZRxBWDVYGf8w6QzJN5jh1LlFweDLcB13UTusDA2sWKBpOcrjy1dPfX1d9jXciXAwztIxFHJniG45-2FcS2on5SCIeh3mQJuCMYfniwmfUh19xevWCsqW7sZHSTVHP0jKnMnAxasN3RtEycr6RdXKFw-3D-3D) , the 17th annual Luxury Property Showcase, which runs from June 22-24. In addition to attending LPS, the group has meetings scheduled with Chinese citizens considering purchasing homes in the U.S., as well as Chinese real estate brokerages and relocation experts. Michi Olson, Vice President of Relocation and Business Development, leads the group of APR agents through this unique adventure abroad.

In Beijing, APR will mark its 10th year of attending LPS as one of the first California brokerages to exhibit at the luxury showcase.

 

We're Luxury

 

 

 

UPCOMING LEADINGRE WEBINARS

 

Learn how to maximize your affiliation with Luxury Portfolio through these upcoming webinars.

Using the My Contacts Sections of LuxeXchange
Wednesday, June 13, 2018 from 1:00 – 2:00 p.m. Register now! (http://o1.apr.com/wf/click?upn=cBqXFUYfxgXEjKNrUffxDHxPOjVquHJr5dr26YK1Nthf-2Fq2dTAasVgjQrBlP8DJ02O3o7OtJzZjWo6SxCaYF9g-3D-3D_HcmTR6jcYpC88W5oqhq2V-2BAMMsb3FgDrZK-2FWrVbQy-2FF-2FB2yZzBnlLOfva5OGS29YqK25C0vEUl7krBYMmjqh74tgu9Ol9I1sTPIEwWRAgCDeacHSvdHnO0INJTTyZIVWmdqX2DUXYRdQYgXq5X9nkYVQR5oZFjZtIDt0sR-2BtjADADDFHlN09IKMAgx5Icu7hrDf3vDSKcAvC00mMPFAl-2FkfbUZwRzx37aGKlN-2FWgbeSsB8nm-2BPptqtq7r5TRgFoaDfsehMmv64CRC3dqznipjCwrKT0F90xQ1krs2RZ-2BkHJuD1uBWzgAnu-2F3uC0-2B-2BEKTdX1EoDIv1GaoJWQbsvUlejz7Hx-2FUI1oBt2hRapvqhf1K4dCeZev4YIXCB6V8G-2FAjDMGPvnU-2BQfbOCW-2BF-2B8frs00pPZQm4lDhwi6pmvUwTls967yr9sjPe5hQ0CzPt6PcaxXuTY1xJ0UvM-2F7TDOdbls71uelT-2Be2JtCvOAVBzcJhRD-2BzCd6RmiXf8l3J2JNsETxBjYeQB9r0IBxvwFqnY1KHksXbFHjEp66b8UaRgpJkCZoTJNNTCvwNEEuejHlWAf0i78fzLZy1rGMSs7YM1vZRURaOscG3IsxX3fD2prCzAZNpi6GEbqyv-2FUM9r4C2gDyhoJC-2FmDymfAtoGzxaosM0QccMXKyQIJAvrzR06Wr7J0CTIvgI28BIzdgHhvT7UKVT0dObeC0L7i-2BPnRyKRWTm8BBfY6mrbdIs3zKocFx3ZeycA2s-2Bnso8VecG62qjoMmQvCZvRuUNodVoa3OUG6w-3D-3D)
Luxury Portfolio provides several different ways for you to easily and automatically communicate with prospects and customers - right from LuxeXchange. Learn more about the client communication tools available in the My Contacts section of LuxeXchange including a review of the tools, how to set up a new client, and get answers to frequently asked questions.

Online Banner Advertising for Properties: A Deep Dive
Tuesday, June 26, 2018 from 1:00 – 2:00 p.m. Register now! (http://o1.apr.com/wf/click?upn=cBqXFUYfxgXEjKNrUffxDHxPOjVquHJr5dr26YK1NtitFhCRYdWpv-2BAHhZM3Zg6yvhbK6a2IYv8Uicg49bTXiQ-3D-3D_HcmTR6jcYpC88W5oqhq2V-2BAMMsb3FgDrZK-2FWrVbQy-2FF-2FB2yZzBnlLOfva5OGS29YqK25C0vEUl7krBYMmjqh74tgu9Ol9I1sTPIEwWRAgCDeacHSvdHnO0INJTTyZIVWmdqX2DUXYRdQYgXq5X9nkYVQR5oZFjZtIDt0sR-2BtjADADDFHlN09IKMAgx5Icu7hrDf3vDSKcAvC00mMPFAl-2FkfbUZwRzx37aGKlN-2FWgbeSsB8nm-2BPptqtq7r5TRgFoaDfsehMmv64CRC3dqznipjCwrKT0F90xQ1krs2RZ-2BkHJuD1uBWzgAnu-2F3uC0-2B-2BEKTdX1EoDIv1GaoJWQbsvUlejz7Hx-2FUI1oBt2hRapvqhf1K4dCeZev4YIXCB6V8G-2FAjDMGPvnU-2BQfbOCW-2BF-2B8frs00pPZQm4lDhwi6pmvUwTls967yr9sjPe5hQ0CzPt6PcaxXuTY1xJ0UvM-2F7TDOdbls71uelT-2Be2JtCvOAVBzcJhRD-2BzCd6RmiXf8l3J2JNsETxBjYeQB9r0IBxvwFqnY1KHksXbFHjEp66b8UaRgpJkCZoTJNNTCvwNEEuejHlWAVIDTWTo6IqQQQYO4Z0gfZl3Ka1yz6mp2utYkX3qwknFhoogn0jRtwH2nQQfLdVNL2iGBXpVo1IdGs8pk2V9JANuEgkmMO3Kl9SobSZXPUI0jHNobSIykYH-2BHOftjPz2XtoMhYR1BfAoN4CVFqsKNwGTWLFPmcnLDIt82o87sAP2disk7YTz98xxGiLB4QidbPehQQmzVVsZjmDlZi9ff-2BA-3D-3D)
Learn more about how you can run targeted online banner ads for your listings! Find out how this unique offering from Luxury Portfolio can help you get ahead with brilliantly simple digital advertising. This webinar will walk through the basics of this tool, building and editing your ad campaign, monitoring campaign analytics, sending seller reports and more!

If you are unable to attend the webinars, you can find the video recordings and slides for download/viewing in the Program Information section of LuxeXchange. Just go to Marketing Support > Presentations/Training Resources.

UPCOMING LP AD DEADLINES

Visit the Print Advertising section of LuxeXchange (http://o1.apr.com/wf/click?upn=IugKWCaczlKN5wjw2DCbZLec21bLZqQpLTWgD0Izz1d0tLkttEvCavtNkrHJHSxpkmEKDPss0u-2B758Fal7bbnQ-3D-3D_HcmTR6jcYpC88W5oqhq2V-2BAMMsb3FgDrZK-2FWrVbQy-2FF-2FB2yZzBnlLOfva5OGS29YqK25C0vEUl7krBYMmjqh74tgu9Ol9I1sTPIEwWRAgCDeacHSvdHnO0INJTTyZIVWmdqX2DUXYRdQYgXq5X9nkYVQR5oZFjZtIDt0sR-2BtjADADDFHlN09IKMAgx5Icu7hrDf3vDSKcAvC00mMPFAl-2FkfbUZwRzx37aGKlN-2FWgbeSsB8nm-2BPptqtq7r5TRgFoaDfsehMmv64CRC3dqznipjCwrKT0F90xQ1krs2RZ-2BkHJuD1uBWzgAnu-2F3uC0-2B-2BEKTdX1EoDIv1GaoJWQbsvUlejz7Hx-2FUI1oBt2hRapvqhf1K4dCeZev4YIXCB6V8G-2FAjDMGPvnU-2BQfbOCW-2BF-2B8frs00pPZQm4lDhwi6pmvUwTls967yr9sjPe5hQ0CzPt6PcaxXuTY1xJ0UvM-2F7TDOdbls71uelT-2Be2JtCvOAVBzcJhRD-2BzCd6RmiXf8l3J2JNsETxBjYeQB9r0IBxvwFqnY1KHksXbFHjEp66b8UaRgpJkCZoTJNNTCvwNEEuejHlWASzCO-2BXaUbOsrRrF2ynDUmWuy3UFsMo3vGnGyJ-2BqDh4d45qjW-2Bh2vfLHEtim683ceM-2FFLjRqUUyLFWVcPMTvkEHpIG3XJZwpL-2FsmABaMLxiC-2F3aXYgoKRe0yB-2FAPAB0qvVuat5Bs9J2Lb-2Bahp2wUTqBGT8u4M-2BiuMM3af-2F8dM8SISOnON6tAEXmif8zilNZLJVh8ZJuj0TewjwW3etC5JVw-3D-3D)  to reserve space for these upcoming advertising opportunities. Note: All properties advertised must be on the Luxury Portfolio website.

Luxe Interiors + Design
September/October Issue
Reservations Due: Thursday, June 7th

Luxeselect
Thursday, June 14 Issue

Mansion Global Homepage Slideshow
July Placement
Reservations Due: Thursday, June 14th
Materials Due: Friday, June 15th

 

New at APR

 

 

 

NEW CONTENT IN CRM

 

If you’re looking to send out a beautiful CRM email piece to your sphere, check out the new banner images in the APR CRM!

On SAVI, just go to CRM > Standalone Campaign > Add Campaign > Business Development > Generic Brand Images. There you will find regional photo banners with and without text.

ADWERX MARKETING MATERIALS NOW AVAILABLE

To leverage APR's online advertising program, a double-sided slick and CRM email piece are available with information on how this unique marketing service will maximize the total audience for each listing in a way that other brokerages just can’t meet. 

Double Sided Slick
Use this slick in your listing presentations to emphasize and explain APR's unique and robust online advertising program. You can find it in your office or on SAVI via Marketing Page > Marketing Documents > Marketing Slicks > Buyer and Seller Tools > Online Ads for Your Home.

CRM
Share the good news to your client's inbox! Look for the custom CRM piece on SAVI via CRM > Standalone Campaign > Add Campaign > Business Development > Online Ads for Your Home.

SYLLABI FOR SUCCESS — NEW LEARNING PATHWAYS AVAILABLE

Now you can easily find new video courses and step-by-step guides focused on business-building activities such as farming, managing leads, winning and promoting listings, and retaining clients. Visit SAVI > Training > The Academy > Library and scroll down to the Syllabi (Learning Pathways) library. Click open the syllabus and select a course name to get more information or take the course immediately. A reminder, all courses in The Academy are provided as a complimentary service from APR Education and Development. 

 

Upcoming Events

 

 

 

PRESIDENT’S ROUNDTABLE 2018

 

 

Congratulations to the agents who qualified for the 2018 President’s Roundtable! This event was held at the California Academy of Sciences museum in San Francisco, with an overnight stay at the St. Regis. Guests toured the exhibits, including the rainforest, aquarium, and African hall, enjoying food, drink, and entertainment along the way. EXCLUSIVE APR INMAN CONNECT DISCOUNT

Inman Connect 2018 will be held from July 16th - 20th at the Hilton San Francisco Union Square. This annual event is a great opportunity to grow your referral network with agents and brokers from across the country and around the world. The sessions offer practical advice on how to grow your business from those who've been there and done it as well as actionable takeaways on how to execute the latest sales and marketing techniques.
